children.text: The freestanding oven has not been secured to prevent it from tilting forward, putting the safety of the occupants at serious risk.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 5601.1 Gas Installation in section 6.10.1.11 Stabilization of a freestanding cooking appliance states that
‘The method recommended in the manufacturer’s instructions to prevent the tilting of a freestanding cooking appliance, when in the installed position, shall be used’ .
This appliance must be properly secured as required by the manufacturer.
